snippet.title: Warlander - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Warlander is a single-player third-person action-adventure that combines story-driven experience with a tactical swordplay system that creates a visceral gameplay experience.

Play as a resurrected hero on a warpath of vengeance. Aim precisely and slice through the flesh of your enemies in ragdoll mayhem! Grow stronger in power, either by chopping your way across the battlefield or by using abilities to turn the environment into a deadly weapon. Wield a blade with a mind of its own while you fight and sacrifice enemies to appease the ancient gods.

Wishlist us on Steam: http://bit.ly/2HN2kGK

Check the latest news on our webpage, Facebook and Twitter:
Webpage: https://warlandergame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warlandergame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/warlandergame
Join us on Discord:
Discord: https://discord.gg/GabjUeb
